author: Chris DeFreitas, chrisd@europa.com
description: Test harness for grinder.js library, a library that tokenizes strings like commandline arguments.
name: grinderTestHarness

scripts.testMultiple1: node console.js -y val1 val2 val3 -- done1
scripts.testMultiple2: node console.js --zz val1 val2 val3 -- done2 done3
scripts.testAll: node console.js unique1 unique2 debug true find bug path = '/home/chris/bin/' nm "55" dt "20017-1-1 12:35 pst" "2015-2-2" --zz = zzValue cb zzz obj {\"hey\":\"Yao!\"}
